greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A051731 * (1, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5,....)
comment: a(n) = prime(n) if n is prime but nonprime n's can also have prime a(n).
Equals left border of triangle A158902
maple: L := [1,seq(n, n=1..100)] ; read("transforms"); MOBIUSi(L) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 02 2009
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 29 2009
